name: Sanjeev Kapoor
bio: Sanjeev Kapoor is an Indian chef, restaurateur, and television personality. He is best known for his fiery temper and high standards in the kitchen, as well as his TV shows 'Hell's Kitchen' and 'MasterChef.' He is a rising star in the culinary world. His signature Italian dishes have earned him fame and reputation in New Jersey. Happily married for 15 years, he works to bring the community together, celebrating the joys of living and eating well.

name: Ranveer Brar

name: Anjum Anand
bio: Anjum Anand is an Indian chef, restaurateur, and television personality. He is known for his focus on healthy, flavorful food and his campaigns to improve school lunches and promote healthy eating. He is the executive chef at (Restaurant name), a popular sushi bar and restaurant in Seattle. With an unparalleled ability to craft amazing rolls, sushi dishes, and sashimi, he has become one of the most sought-after sushi chefs in the Pacific Northwest.

name: Vineet Bhatia
bio: Vineet Bhatia is an Indian chef, author, and television personality. She is known for her indulgent, comfort-food recipes and her ability to make cooking accessible and enjoyable for home cooks. He  is a culinary prodigy whose passion has taken him around the world. Experienced in French, Italian, and Asian cuisine, he has earned repute in the kitchen as well as recognition among the food critics.

name: Saransh Goila
bio: Saransh Goila was an Indian chef, author, and television personality. name: Harpal Singh Sokhi
bio: Harpal Singh Sokhi was an Indian chef, author, and television personality. He was known for his adventurous spirit and his ability to use food to explore different cultures and connect with people around the world. He  is the head chef and owner of Ranna, an award-winning restaurant in the heart of Chicago. With her culinary degree from Le Cordon Bleu and 15 years of cooking experience, she has been creating delicious meals for customers since 2006.
